data:query.name: Report
data:query.data:static-query: SELECT DU.USER_ADDRESS_COUNTRY AS AGENT_COUNTRY ,DD.YYYYMM AS ORDINAL ,DD.`YYYY-MMMM` AS PERIOD ,SUM(FS.SALE_QUANTITY) AS QUANTITY_SOLD ,SUM(FS.SALE_COST_PRICE_AMOUNT) * SUM(FS.SALE_QUANTITY) AS TOTAL_COST ,SUM(FS.SALE_TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_DISCOUNT ,SUM(FS.SALE_TOTAL_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_REVENUE FROM F_SALES FS INNER JOIN D_PRODUCTS DP USING(PRODUCT_TK) INNER JOIN D_USERS DU ON FS.ASSIGNED_USER_TK = DU.USER_TK INNER JOIN D_DATE DD ON FS.SALE_PAID_DATE_TK = DD.DATE_TK WHERE DD.`YYYY-MM` BETWEEN (${pSalePaidFromDateFilter}) AND (${pSalePaidToDateFilter}) AND (DU.USER_ADDRESS_COUNTRY IN (${pUserCountryFilter}) OR 'All Agent Countries' IN (${pUserCountryFilter})) AND (FS.SALE_DELETED = ${pShowDeletedRecords} OR 1 = ${pShowDeletedRecords}) GROUP BY 1,2,3 ORDER BY 1,2 DESC,3;
